newsitem.title: USA: TABLE - Schmitt Industries Q4 results.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Schmitt Industries Q4 results.

text.p: Schmitt Industries Inc. of Portland is pleased to announce

Note - On June 4, 1997, the Company issued estimated sales and earnings which were slightly higher than these audited numbers. The difference was in duplication of sales and profits due to inter-company sales. Gross profits were also understated on the previous news release. Actual FY 97 gross profit was 63.2%.
Schmitt's audited FY 97 earnings are $0.23 per share, a 44% increase over FY 96 earnings of $0.16 per share.

Sales for the fourth quarter FY 97 set a new record of $3,091,048 vs. $2,357,293 for the same fourth quarter period last year. Gross profits for the fourth quarter FY 97 were $2,043,090 vs. $1,493,502 for FY 96. Net profits for the fourth quarter of FY 97 were $518,452 vs. $441,474 for the fourth quarter of FY 96, with net earnings per share at $0.07 for the quarter in FY 97 vs. $0.07 per share for the same quarter in FY 96.

Management expects that the trends in increased sales and profitability of the Company will continue into Fiscal Year 1998 and beyond. Major new customers were added to our Balancer business as well as our Measurement business during the last year. Management expects to release new Measurement products and Balancer products in Fiscal Year 1998 which are now under development.
